name: Potat-Out
description:
Timmy is bored and decided to make a potato gun.  It just so happens, that a bunch of zombies were passing by and now he has the perfect opportunity to test his new weapon !!

The game is endless. Goal is to collect as many points as possible by shooting zombies with potatoes :) It gets quite challenging so you have to spend earned coins wisely and upgrade your potato gun. Oh yeah... and always check you don't run out of potatoes!

This little game was my experimental project which over time became a thing, so I decided to share it with everyone. Planning to build more levels, maybe a small campaign even, or multiplayer when I have more time... Future is uncertain, but in the meantime... Have Fun !!! Thank You.
